about_the_game:
TorchR Runners: Demastered is a retro, co-op precision platformer that tests your reflexes, sanity, and teamwork. In a world shrouded in darkness, you and your fellow players carry torches that slowly extinguish. As your light fades, so does your sanity. Teamwork is crucial to overcome the challenges ahead, and if your torches or sanity depletes, it’s gonna get even more difficult.

While the controls are simple and intuitive, mastering the levels requires clever cooperation and quick thinking. The deeper you go, the more challenging it becomes, making finishing the game an almost impossible feat.

The faster you complete levels, the more coins you keep – but beware, your coins drain over time. Use them to buy extra sanity or lives at scattered shops, the only safe places in the TorcherR’s world.

The heart of the experience is cooperation. You need at least one other runner to overcome the challenges and move ahead, but the game is open to any number of participants. The game’s shared pool of lives means everyone must work together to survive. Each failure takes a toll on the group – and the sadistic narrator, The TorcherR, is more than happy to mock your every misstep.

Can you and your team survive the traps, the dark, and the unrelenting taunts of the TorcherR?

Key Features

  • Co-op Precision Platformer – Every level is designed for two players, though any number can join in. Collaboration is key to success!

  • Simple Controls, Challenging Gameplay – Easy to pick up with simple controls, but mastering the darkness will test even the most skilled players.

  • Shared Lives – All players share the same pool of lives, meaning each death or misstep affects the entire team.

  • Race Against Time – Your coins drain with every second, pushing you to overcome his traps quickly to save more coins for shops along the way.

  • Dynamic Narrator – The TorcherR mocks your every move, taunting you along the way, waiting for you to give up.

  • Retro Visuals – Featuring sharp pixel textures and low-poly 3D models, the visuals pay homage to classic platformers while embracing a dark and eerie tone.

  • Jump Scares & Tension – Face monsters and eerie surprises as you race to keep your sanity, with heart-pounding jump scares thrown into the mix.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750 (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low-poly 3D models, small pixelated textures
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 570 (4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Best performance with higher framerates

short_description: Carry your flickering torch through perilous traps in this retro-inspired cooperative platformer. Work together to keep your sanity intact, beat reflex-driven challenges, and survive the misanthropic taunts of the "TorcherR" – all while racing against time before your light runs out!
